title: Can anyone help me out?
content:
I am looking for a nice font that is similar to "cachet" but without the rounded corners. I am especially looking for the same "open" C's and S's. Preferbly with a black version. Any sugestions would be very much appreciated.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/cachet/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160636/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/cachet/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/cachet/")

Thord
author: Thord

comments.content:
Klavika? [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/klavika/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160636/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/klavika/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/klavika/") "Similar (to Klavika) faces, as listed by Stephen Coles:
Cachet and its weaker sequel, Zemestro.
More remote: FF Unit, Pill Gothic, Magnion, Cholla, Vista (in a distant way)." [http://cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/choice.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160636/http:/cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/choice.html "http://cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/choice.html")

I believe Zemstro is based upon Cachet...

[http://www.itcfonts.com/fonts/mondosearchresults.htm?st=12&kid=zemestro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160636/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/mondosearchresults.htm?st=12&kid=zemestro "http://www.itcfonts.com/fonts/mondosearchresults.htm?st=12&kid=zemestro")

A lot of good suggestions here...

Thanks guys!
